scripts.build: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/build.ts
scripts.start: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json API_SERVER_PORT=9455 INSPECT_CHROME=9222 node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/start.ts
scripts.start:debug: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.script.json API_SERVER_PORT=9455 INSPECT_CHROME=9222 node --inspect-brk=9688 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register scripts/start.ts
